official_title: A bill entitled the "Saccharin Study and Labeling Act Amendment of 1981".
short_title: Saccharin Study and Labeling Act Amendments of 1981

summary.text: Saccharin Study and Labeling Act Amendment of 1981 - Amends the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend, until 24 months after the date of enactment of this Act the period during which the Secretary of Health and Human Services may not take certain actions to restrict the continued use of saccharin or of any food, drug, or cosmetic containing saccharin.

titles.title: Saccharin Study and Labeling Act Amendments of 1981
A bill entitled the "Saccharin Study and Labeling Act Amendment of 1981".
